amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part D of House Report 118-115 to express the sense of Congress that healthcare freedom is the future of healthcare.
amendment.purpose: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that healthcare freedom is the future of healthcare.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 206 (Roll no. 280).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Roy.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 206 (Roll no. 280).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
